mapper.insert: insert into tbl_sampleboard (title, content, writer) values(#{title}, #{content}, #{writer})
mapper.select: select * from tbl_sampleboard where 1=1 and bno > (select max(bno) - 100000 from tbl_sampleboard) and del = 0 order by bno desc limit #{skip},#{display}
mapper.update: update tbl_sampleboard set del = 1 where bno= #{bno}
update tbl_sampleboard set title = #{title}, content = #{content}, writer = #{writer}, updatedate = now() where bno = #{bno}
